description:
This course is a part in a series of courses that covers a complete course in probability theory taught in the US colleges.

If you take this course, you can count on my help. I will answer every single question you post on the discussion board.

If you are looking for an efficient way to learn notions of probability theory, I guarantee that this course is for you. In fact, I offer a 30 day money back guarantee.

In this course you will learn conditional probability, Bayes formula, and you will learn how to tell whether two (or more) events are independent or not. The notions of conditional probability and independence are at the heart of probability theory.

The course consists of

  • theoretic lectures and lectures with motivations, and
  • practice lectures

In general, practice lectures are marked as easy, intermediate and advanced. All lectures are accompanied with downloadable transcripts.
title: Probability made easy: Learn Bayes Law
